articles.summary: Avalanche's AVAX token experienced a sharp reversal after its recent rally. It fell to $20.25 and established a critical support zone between $20 and $20:30 on CoinDesk's analysis. It had previously risen 3.72% to $21.48.

articles.author: Bit RSS

articles.title: BitMEX Launches June Jumpstart Trading Competition with a 3 BTC Prize Pool
articles.author: Bit RSS
articles.summary: BitMEX announced today the launch of its June Jumpstart Trading Competition. It allows traders to compete for their share of a 3 BTC prize pool. The competition will take place in Mahe, Seychelles on June 9th 2025.

articles.summary: Seraph (SERAPH) has been added to Binance Alpha's platform. BinanceAlpha is a dedicated corner within the Binance ecosystem designed to showcase promising early-stage crypto projects. The move was announced via Binance's official X account.

articles.title: Paraguay's presidency swiftly debunks Bitcoin legal tender hoax, confirms X account hack
articles.author: Cryptoslate
articles.summary: Paraguayan President Santiago Peña's verified X account was hacked and he published an unauthorized declaration that Bitcoin would be made legal tender on June 9. The post also included a false plan to establish a Bitcoin treasury and add $5 million in BTC. The Paraguayan government officially recognizes Bitcoin as legal tender.

articles.title: BlackRock's Bitcoin ETF Smashes $70B Mark in Record Time, 5X Faster Than Gold
articles.author: Coin Gape
articles.summary: BlackRock's spot Bitcoin ETF has attracted $70 billion in inflows, a world record for a single exchange-traded fund. BlackRock's Bitcoin ETF is now valued at more than $70billion. Blackrock is a major player in the Bitcoin market.

articles.title: Will This Whale's 20X Leverage Bet Push Bitcoin to a New All-Time High?
articles.author: Coin Edition
articles.summary: A new wallet placed a $54.5 million long position on Bitcoin using 20x leverage via Hyperliquid. The trade was initiated when Bitcoin was priced at $106,538. Analysts suggest the bold move signals bullish sentiment and could contribute to a push toward a new all-time high.

articles.title: Creating digital connections
articles.author: 李潇阳
articles.summary: In January, RedNote, a Chinese lifestyle and e-commerce platform, became the most downloaded app in the U.S. App Store. Many American users learned Chinese to better interact with netizens across the Pacific. The demographic driving this digital bridge-building is predominantly young Americans and Chinese users who grew up in the Internet age.

articles.title: Donald Trump's pardon spree is an absolute disaster
articles.author: Ron Leshnower
articles.summary: Donald Trump's recent pardons have wiped out as much as $1.34 billion in court-ordered restitution, fines, and penalties. He's issued 1,558 pardons in less than 5 months of his second term. This is more than six times as many pardons as President Biden issued in a fraction of the time.
